description:
The Odd Jobs gang has gone to the mountains to go hunting for matsutake mushrooms. Gintoki is in high spirits, but a hunter named Marinosuke appears before him and warns him to leave the mountain quickly because it`s dangerous. But Gintoki and the others don`t listen and are intent on finding matsutake mushrooms. Masamune, a giant bear that`s being controlled by a space mushroom, appears before the group! Gintoki and the others escape thanks to Marinosuke. They try to fight Masamune to collect a reward. But a mushroom just like the one controlling Masamune is growing out of Gintoki`s head!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Findet ihr Matsutake-Pilze wirklich so lecker? Lasst euch das lieber nochmal durch den Kopf gehen!
Matsutakette Oishii Mon na no ka Ichido Yoku Kangaete Miyou
そんなに松茸って美味しいもんなのか一度よく考えてみよう
